data.title: Oklahoma City Thunder Live Stream Options for Die
data.meta_description: It's time to let go of cable and move to one of the many streaming services. Here's how you can watch the Oklahoma City Thunder online without cable
data.text:
You can watch Thunder games online using a streaming service. All of the channels you need are available, so there’s no reason you need cable to watch your favorite sport.

In a hurry? These three streaming services will let you sign up and watch the next Oklahoma Thunder game without cable:

The Oklahoma City Thunder have been in Oklahoma since 2008. Before that, they did time in Seattle, where they were formed, as the Seattle SuperSonics. Oklahoma City has embraced this team and as loyal fans, they support their team from the start to the finish, each season.

If you’re one of those fans, keep reading to learn more about how to stream Oklahoma City Thunder games online.

Sign Up for a Free Fubo Trial

What Channels Offer the Oklahoma City Thunder without Cable?

NBA teams tend to air most of their games through regional sports channels. In the case of the Oklahoma City Thunder, the majority of games will air on Bally Sports Oklahoma — available from Fubo and DIRECTV STREAM.

A number of NBA games air nationally on ABC, ESPN, TNT, and NBA TV. This season, the Thunder will appear on 13 nationally televised games:

ABC: 0 games

ESPN: 4 games

NBA TV: 5 games

TNT: 4 games

How to Watch the Oklahoma City Thunder Online Without Cable

After you’ve picked your service and you’re ready to start streaming, you’ll need a streaming device. There are several options for streaming at home and on the go. You can use your laptop, computer, or even mobile devices like phones or tablets.

You can also connect to a TV with Apple TV, Roku, Chromecast, or Amazon Fire TV. Even some gaming consoles work to help you watch many streaming services.

Sign Up for a Free Fubo Trial

Watch the Oklahoma City Thunder Online with Fubo

Fubo (formerly FuboTV) has 150+ channels in their main package for $94.98/mo. It includes Bally Sports Oklahoma, ABC, and ESPN. NBA TV is available with the Fubo Extra ($7.99/mo) and Sports Plus ($10.99/mo) add-ons. TNT is not available so you will miss out on 4 games.

More Fubo details:

$94.98/mo

150+ live TV channels

NBA League Pass available for $14.99/mo

unlimited cloud DVR

Streaming on up to 10 devices simultaneously

Find out more in our Fubo review

Fubo works for sports fans and for people that like general entertainment channels and primetime TV. You’ll be able to watch TV on your terms. You can choose between live or on-demand content.

Sign Up for a Free Fubo Trial

Watch the Oklahoma City Thunder Live Stream on DIRECTV STREAM

DIRECTV STREAM provides all the channels you need to watch every Oklahoma City Thunder game in its Choice Package for $108.99/mo. In all, you get over 100 channels.

DIRECTV STREAM highlights:

$108.99/mo

100+ live TV channels

NBA League Pass available

Unlimited cloud DVR (9 month storage)

Unlimited simultaneous streaming devices

Our Hulu + Live TV review has more to offer

Get DIRECTV STREAM Free for 5 Days

Other Ways to Watch the Oklahoma City Thunder Online

While you’ve already heard some pretty great options, there are other services out there that you can use to watch the Oklahoma City Thunder without cable. The following services offer at least one channel you’ll need for Thunder streaming. Here are your additional options:

Sling TV – Sling Orange starts at $40.00/mo. TNT and ESPN are included, and you can add NBA TV with the sports bundle. Read our Sling TV review, here.

Hulu + Live TV — Great general streaming service with 85+ live TV channels, ESPN+, and Disney+ for $76.99/mo. See our Hulu Live review.

YouTube TV – Watch some of the Oklahoma City Thunder season online from $72.99/mo. Over 85 channels are included. Learn more in our YouTube TV review.

Sign Up for a Free Fubo Trial

2023-24 Oklahoma City Thunder Schedule

Unless otherwise indicated, games will be available on Bally Sports Oklahoma and NBA League Pass.

Wrapping Up

All the Oklahoma City Thunder games can be watched on Bally Sports Oklahoma and NBA League Pass. Fubo is our choice for both. Fubo allows you to try out its service with a free trial.

FAQs

How can I stream Oklahoma City Thunder games?

If you live in the Bally Sports Oklahoma broadcast area, a subscription to Fubo ($91.98/mo) or DIRECTV STREAM ($108.99/mo) will grant you access to locally produced Thunder games. Conversely, those generally outside of this area can watch those same broadcasts through an NBA League Pass subscription ($14.99/mo). The blackout area for the Thunder covers all of Oklahoma and Kansas and parts of Arkansas, Missouri, and Nebraska.

What channels are Oklahoma City Thunder games broadcast on?

Bally Sports Oklahoma broadcasts nearly all Thunder contests, including all 82 regular-season games in the 2023-24 season. Of that campaign, 13 Oklahoma City contests are being shown to a national audience, all of which are being broadcast on ESPN (4), NBA TV (5), or TNT (4).

Sign Up for a Free Fubo Trial

How can I listen to Oklahoma City Thunder radio broadcasts?

The Thunder Radio Network’s flagship station is WWLS-The Sports Animal 98.1 FM while other stations throughout Oklahoma simulcast those broadcasts. Fans located within 75 miles of Oklahoma’s capital city can also listen on either the Thunder’s or WWLS’ app while NBA League Pass Audio ($9.99/yr) streams those broadcasts online to subscribers worldwide. Fans in Oklahoma City who prefer Spanish-language commentary can listen to home games on WKY-La Indomable 930 AM.

Where did the Thunder play before they moved to Oklahoma City?

The Oklahoma City Thunder used to be the Seattle SuperSonics. They played in the Emerald City from their inaugural season of 1967-68 through to the 2007-08 campaign. Although fans in Seattle were heartbroken by the move, those welcoming them in Oklahoma City were excited about being the permanent home of a major professional sports franchise for the first time.

Have the Oklahoma City Thunder won an NBA championship?

Have the Oklahoma City Thunder won an NBA championship?

How can I watch the Oklahoma City Thunder on my mobile device?

DIRECTV STREAM and the NBA both offer apps that stream Oklahoma City Thunder broadcasts to subscribers who have the rights to access those games through their DIRECTV STREAM or NBA League Pass subscription. Also, DIRECTV STREAM and similar streaming services provide access to Thunder games being shown on ABC, ESPN, TNT, and NBA TV.

How do I watch the Thunder’s conference rivals?

Here are all the Western Conference teams with their local channels:

Dallas Mavericks — Bally Sports Southwest

Denver Nuggets — Altitude Sports

Golden State Warriors — NBC Sports Bay Area

Houston Rockets — AT&T SportsNet Southwest

LA Clippers — Bally Sports San Diego / Bally Sports SoCal

Los Angeles Lakers — Spectrum SportsNet

Memphis Grizzlies — Bally Sports Southeast

Minnesota Timberwolves — Bally Sports North

New Orleans Pelicans — Bally Sports New Orleans

Oklahoma City Thunder — Bally Sports Oklahoma

Phoenix Suns — KTVK/KPHE

Portland Trail Blazers — Root Sports Northwest

Sacramento Kings — NBC Sports California

San Antonio Spurs — Bally Sports Southwest

Utah Jazz — KJZZ
